UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A 17-mer Membrane-Active MSI-78 Derivative with Improved Selectivity toward Bacterial Cells.
Literature.Author: Monteiro C, Pinheiro M, Fernandes M, Maia S, Seabra CL, Ferreira-da-Silva F, Reis S, Gomes P, Martins MC

Literature.Title: Directed chemical dimerisation enhances the antibacterial activity of the antimicrobial peptide MSI-78(4–20)
Literature.Author: Li R, Handley TNG, Li W, O’Brien-Simpson NM, Hossain MA, Wade JD
